data.title: GIR Spaghetti Spoon

data.text:
Like our critically-acclaimed ladle, the GIR spaghetti spoon has a flexible front edge to squish into tight corners and grab every last noodle.

‚Ä¢ Center drainage holes are small enough to prevent macaroni from slipping through, but big enough to drain quickly.

‚Ä¢ Nine teeth are thoughtfully spaced for maximum scooping efficiency.

‚Ä¢ Unibody design has no holes or seams, making it super hygienic and easy to clean; dishwasher safe

‚Ä¢ 100% lifetime guarantee. Made to last forever in your kitchen.
